text: o manavulara! Mi prabhuvu nande bhayabhaktulu kaligi undandi. Mariyu a dinaniki bhayapadandi, (enadaite) tandri tana kumaruniki nastapariharam cellincaledo mariyu e kumarudu kuda tana tandriki elanti nastapariharam cellincaledo! Niscayanga, allah vagdanam satyam! Kavuna i prapancika jivitam mim'malni mosaniki guri ceyanivvakudadu. Mariyu a vancakunni (saitanunu) mim'malni allah visayanlo vancanaku guri ceyanivvakudadu suma
